simple
v1
----
voters=(1)
1: StateProbe match=0 next=0

v2
----
voters=(1 2)
1: StateProbe match=0 next=0

simple
l1
----
voters=(2) learners=(1)
1: StateProbe match=0 next=0 learner
2: StateProbe match=0 next=2

l1
----
voters=(2) learners=(1)
1: StateProbe match=0 next=0 learner
2: StateProbe match=0 next=2
